---
id: _third_party_copy_trade_leaderorderhistoryget
title: Leader order history
sidebar_label: Leader order history
description: /public/futures/trade/v1/public/copy-trade/leader-order-history
---

## 接口

**GET** `/public/futures/trade/v1/public/copy-trade/leader-order-history`

## 请求参数

| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 说明 | 范围 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `leaderAccountId` | number | 是 |  | leader account id |  |
| `symbol` | String | 否 |  | symbol. If no symbol are passed, all transaction pairs are queried |  |
| `id` | number | 否 |  | page id |  |
| `direction` | String | 是 | NEXT | page direction | NEXT/PREV |
| `limit` | number | 是 | 10 | page size |  |

## 示例请求

### Java

```java
public String leaderOrderHistoryGet(){


}
```

## 响应示例

### Response

```json
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [
    {}
  ],
  "result": {
      "hasPrev": false,   //prev
      "hasNext": false,   //next
      "items": [{
                "closePrice": 0,
                "closeSize":0
                "closeTime": 0,
                "id": 0,
                "openLeverage": 0,
                "openMargin": 0,
                "openPrice": 0,
                "openSize": 0,
                "openTime": 0,
                "orderId": 0,
                "positionSide": "",   //side:LONG;SHORT
                "positionType": "",   //type:CROSSED;ISOLATED
                "profitRate": 0,
                "realizedPnl": 0,
                "symbolName": "",
                "trackNo": 0,
             }]
  }
}
```
